title: Screens
description: A Screen is a conceptual grouping for React Native Components used in nagivation. Technically a screen is a component but in order to standardize how we work with react we want you to think of screen as its own thing. Screen are not to be imported by other Screen, Components or Layouts.

title: Services
description: Services are focused classed designed to interact with web API endpoints. As a good design pattern a service should:
